name: My Family's House
description:
"My Family's House" is a short, one-shot visual novel I made in April of 2018. It was an experiment to see if I could make something short, eerie, and self contained in one sitting, and what something made in those kind of limitations would look like.

It's not particularly long, or dense of material, and I would probably make something with this concept a little differently if I were to do it nowadays, but I felt it was a fun little tidbit of history that I would make available again.
